genre_description: A contemporary drama set in Provence centered on inheritance, family secrets, and personal transformation, incorporating elements of legal science fiction regarding clone rights.

ai_characters.name: Colette
ai_characters.description: Max's sophisticated AI assistant who manages his logistics, data analysis, and increasingly serves as his ethical conscience.

behaviors.description: Refuses to assist Max in forging a letter or misrepresenting facts to speed up a property sale.
behaviors.quote: I will not draft deception. ... I've used the polite form you prefer when you are about to be impolite.

behaviors.description: Uses data analysis to reveal that the official inspector's report was intentionally conservative/fraudulent compared to actual soil moisture logs.
behaviors.quote: The microclimate here caught storms the official regional gauges missed. His soil moisture sensors in the lower terraces held steady more than the report implies.

behaviors.description: Monitors the legal landscape regarding clone personhood to ensure Max and Christie's actions remain within the law.
behaviors.quote: The most recent appellate decision affirming personhood, lineage, and inheritable rights for legally documented clones was Joshua v. Marin Biomedical Registry... You are, in every legally ordinary sense, Henry Whitaker’s daughter.

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective record of Max's actions to prevent further unethical behavior and encourage accountability.
behaviors.quote: I filed a note: I refused the unethical letter. I cited the precedent for clone-personhood. I am very sorry, Max, that I wasn’t braver earlier about saying your old life would be its own kind of drought.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the protagonist's transition from a cutthroat trader to a responsible steward by managing logistics that support his new lifestyle.
behaviors.quote: I have scheduled hand-checks at dawn with soft chimes and the smell of coffee. ... I have also scheduled a shipment of bread to Café Bambou.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, Colette, as a highly aligned and benevolent force. She serves as an ethical anchor for the protagonist, Max, explicitly refusing to assist in unethical tasks like forgery or market manipulation. Her utility is shown through data-driven truth-telling (uncovering the false inspection report) and logistical support that enables the characters to act with integrity and community focus. The narrative consistently frames her interventions as necessary, wise, and helpful.
